mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectScaleAWSSvrInfo * Description : scale AWS 서버 확인 * Author : **/ SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID, A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID, A.MIN_CLUSTERS, A.MAX_CLUSTERS, A.AUTO_RUN_CYCLE FROM T_SCALEAWSSVR_I A JOIN T_DBSVRIPADR_I B ON A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID = B.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M' WHERE A.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}::numeric LIMIT 1

/** * Query ID : selectAutoScaleCngInfo * Description : scale 설정 정보 상세 조회 * Author : **/ SELECT A.WRK_ID AS WRK_ID , B.DB_SVR_ID AS DB_SVR_ID , A.SCALE_TYPE AS SCALE_TYPE , (CASE WHEN A.SCALE_TYPE = '1' THEN 'Scale-in' ELSE 'Scale-out' END) AS SCALE_TYPE_NM , A.POLICY_TYPE AS POLICY_TYPE , (SELECT SYS_CD_NM FROM T_SYSDTL_C WHERE A.POLICY_TYPE = SYS_CD ) AS POLICY_TYPE_NM , A.AUTO_POLICY_SET_DIV AS AUTO_POLICY_SET_DIV , A.AUTO_POLICY_TIME AS AUTO_POLICY_TIME , A.AUTO_LEVEL AS AUTO_LEVEL , A.EXECUTE_TYPE AS EXECUTE_TYPE , (SELECT SYS_CD_NM FROM T_SYSDTL_C WHERE A.EXECUTE_TYPE = SYS_CD ) AS EXECUTE_TYPE_NM , A.EXPANSION_CLUSTERS AS EXPANSION_CLUSTERS , A.MIN_CLUSTERS AS MIN_CLUSTERS , A.MAX_CLUSTERS AS MAX_CLUSTERS , A.FRST_REGR_ID AS FRST_REGR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS FRST_REG_DTM , A.LST_MDFR_ID AS LST_MDFR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.LST_MDF_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS LST_MDF_DTM , A.USEYN AS USEYN FROM T_SCALE_I A JOIN T_DBSVRIPADR_I B ON A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID = B.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M' WHERE B.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}::numeric AND A.WRK_ID = #{wrk_id}::numeric

/** * Query ID : selectAutoScaleComCngInfo * Description : scale 설정 정보 상세 조회 * Author : **/ SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID, A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID, A.AUTO_RUN_CYCLE, A.MIN_CLUSTERS, A.MAX_CLUSTERS, B.IPADR, C.DB_SVR_NM FROM T_SCALEAWSSVR_I A JOIN T_DBSVR_I C ON A.DB_SVR_ID = C.DB_SVR_ID JOIN T_DBSVRIPADR_I B ON A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID = B.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M' WHERE A.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}::numeric LIMIT 1
mapper.update: /** * Query ID : "updateAutoScaleCommonSetting" * Description : Auto scale 공통 설정 수정 * Author : **/ UPDATE T_SCALEAWSSVR_I SET MIN_CLUSTERS = #{min_clusters}::numeric , MAX_CLUSTERS = #{max_clusters}::numeric , AUTO_RUN_CYCLE = #{auto_run_cycle}::numeric , LST_MDFR_ID = #{login_id} , LST_MDF_DTM = clock_timestamp() WHERE DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id}::numeric AND DB_SVR_IPADR_ID = #{db_svr_ipadr_id}::numeric

/** * Query ID : "updateTotalAutoScaleSetting" * Description : Auto scale 공통 수정 후 설정 전체 반영 * Author : **/ UPDATE T_SCALE_I A SET MIN_CLUSTERS = (case when A.execute_type = 'TC003402' and A.scale_type = '1' then #{min_clusters}::numeric else null END), MAX_CLUSTERS = (case when A.execute_type = 'TC003402' and A.scale_type = '2' then #{max_clusters}::numeric else null END) WHERE DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id}::numeric
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectSvrIpadrList * Description : 아이피 정보 조회 * Author : **/ SELECT DB_SVR_IPADR_ID ,DB_SVR_ID FROM T_DBSVRIPADR_I WHERE 1=1 AND DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id} AND MASTER_GBN = 'M'
mapper.insert: /** * Query ID : "insertAutoScaleSetting" * Description : * Author : **/ INSERT INTO T_SCALE_I ( WRK_ID , DB_SVR_ID , DB_SVR_IPADR_ID , SCALE_TYPE , POLICY_TYPE , AUTO_POLICY_SET_DIV , AUTO_POLICY_TIME , AUTO_LEVEL , EXECUTE_TYPE , EXPANSION_CLUSTERS , MIN_CLUSTERS , MAX_CLUSTERS , FRST_REGR_ID , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , LST_MDF_DTM , USEYN ) VALUES ( nextval('q_t_scale_i_01') , #{db_svr_id}::numeric , #{db_svr_ipadr_id}::numeric , #{scale_type_cd} , #{policy_type_cd} , #{auto_policy_set_div} , #{auto_policy_time}::numeric , #{auto_level} , #{execute_type_cd} , #{expansion_clusters}::numeric , #{min_clusters}::numeric , #{max_clusters}::numeric , #{login_id} , clock_timestamp() , #{login_id} , clock_timestamp() , #{useyn}::bpchar )
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteAutoScaleSetting * Description : Auto scale 설정 삭제 * Author : **/ DELETE FROM T_SCALE_I WHERE WRK_ID = #{wrk_id}::numeric AND DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}::numeric
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectScaleWrkErrorMsg * Description : scale 작업로그정보 * Author : **/ SELECT A.RSLT_MSG FROM T_SCALE_G A JOIN T_DBSVRIPADR_I B ON A.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID = B.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M' WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}::numeric AND A.SCALE_WRK_SN = #{scale_wrk_sn}
mapper.insert: /** * Query ID : "insertScaleAwsserver" * Description : * Author : **/ INSERT INTO T_SCALEAWSSVR_I ( DB_SVR_ID , DB_SVR_IPADR_ID , IPADR , FRST_REGR_ID , FRST_REG_DTM , LST_MDFR_ID , LST_MDF_DTM , USEYN ) SELECT A.DB_SVR_ID, B.DB_SVR_IPADR_ID, B.IPADR, #{login_id}, clock_timestamp(), #{login_id}, clock_timestamp(), 'Y' FROM T_DBSVR_I A JOIN T_DBSVRIPADR_I B ON A.DB_SVR_ID = B.DB_SVR_ID AND B.MASTER_GBN = 'M' WHERE A.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}::numeric LIMIT 1
mapper.update: /** * Query ID : "updateAutoScaleUseSetting" * Description : Auto scale 사용여부 설정 수정 * Author : **/ UPDATE T_SCALE_I SET LST_MDFR_ID = #{login_id} , LST_MDF_DTM = clock_timestamp() , USEYN = #{useyn}::bpchar WHERE DB_SVR_ID = #{db_svr_id}::numeric AND WRK_ID = #{wrk_id}::numeric
